query:
INSERT INTO task_runs (
                organization_id,
                task_id,
                status,
                started_at,
                completed_at,
                exit_code,
                error_message,
                last_heartbeat_at
            )
            VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, $7, $8)
            ON CONFLICT (organization_id, task_id, started_at) DO UPDATE SET
                status = $3,
                completed_at = $5,
                exit_code = $6,
                error_message = $7,
                last_heartbeat_at = $8
